title: The Linesmen
creator_credit: Peter Griffiths, AEI Film Unit and British Information Services
brief_description: The engineer in charge of erecting pylons and transmission cables for the overhead grid system in North Wales, vividly describes the work. It is exacting and often dangerous. The survey of the proposed route is seen, also the testing of a new type of tower shows examples of skilled methods and modern equipment used.
